Package xxl.connectivity.colt

The package xxl.core.connectivity.colt contains classes that use functionality provided in the colt library.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
ColtContinuousRandomWrapper This class provides a wrapper for using any random element provided in the colt library with xxl.
ColtDiscreteRandomWrapper This class provides a wrapper for using any random element given from the colt library with xxl.
ColtDiscreteRandomWrapper.DiscreteUniform This class uses the continuous uniform distribution shipped with colt to provide a discrete uniform distribution.
Processors This class provides iterators delivering Integer-objects.
RandomElementReservoirSampler This class provide a sampling algorithm based upon the reservoir sampling algorithm using a given PRNG shipped with the colt library.
RandomNumbers This class provides some static methods to obtain pseudo random numbers of different distributions using the colt library with the Mersenne Twister PRNG (pseudo random number generator).
Samplers This class uses the sampling tools given by the colt library to draw a sample from given data.
 

Package xxl.connectivity.colt Description

The package xxl.core.connectivity.colt contains classes that use functionality provided in the colt library. This includes particularly different classes and wrappers for generating discrete or continuous pseudo random numbers and samples of input data.
